00098 int
00099 Cudd_zddDagSize(
00100   DdNode * p_node)
00101 {
00102 
00103     int         i;      
00104     st_table    *table;
00105 
00106     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00107     i = cuddZddDagInt(p_node, table);
00108     st_free_table(table);
00109     return(i);
00110 
00111 } /* end of Cudd_zddDagSize */

00128 double
00129 Cudd_zddCountMinterm(
00130   DdManager * zdd,
00131   DdNode * node,
00132   int  path)
00133 {
00134     double      dc_var, minterms;       
00135 
00136     dc_var = (double)((double)(zdd->sizeZ) - (double)path);
00137     minterms = Cudd_zddCountDouble(zdd, node) / pow(2.0, dc_var);
00138     return(minterms);
00139 
00140 } /* end of Cudd_zddCountMinterm */

00154 void
00155 Cudd_zddPrintSubtable(
00156   DdManager * table)
00157 {
00158     int         i, j;
00159     DdNode      *z1, *z1_next, *base;
00160     DdSubtable  *ZSubTable;
00161 
00162     base = table->one;
00163     for (i = table->sizeZ - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00164         ZSubTable = &(table->subtableZ[i]);
00165         printf("subtable[%d]:\n", i);
00166         for (j = ZSubTable->slots - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
00167             z1 = ZSubTable->nodelist[j];
00168             while (z1 != NIL(DdNode)) {
00169                 (void) fprintf(stdout,
00170 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00171                     "ID = 0x%lx\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t",
00172                     (unsigned long) z1 / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode),
00173                     z1->index, z1->ref);
00174 #else
00175                     "ID = 0x%x\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t",
00176                     (unsigned) z1 / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode),
00177                     z1->index, z1->ref);
00178 #endif
00179                 z1_next = Cudd_T(z1);
00180                 if (Cudd_IsConstant(z1_next)) {
00181                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = %d\t\t",
00182                         (z1_next == base));
00183                 }
00184                 else {
00185 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00186                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = 0x%lx\t",
00187                         (unsigned long) z1_next / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00188 #else
00189                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = 0x%x\t",
00190                         (unsigned) z1_next / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00191 #endif
00192                 }
00193                 z1_next = Cudd_E(z1);
00194                 if (Cudd_IsConstant(z1_next)) {
00195                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = %d\n",
00196                         (z1_next == base));
00197                 }
00198                 else {
00199 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00200                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = 0x%lx\n",
00201                         (unsigned long) z1_next / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00202 #else
00203                     (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = 0x%x\n",
00204                         (unsigned) z1_next / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00205 #endif
00206                 }
00207 
00208                 z1_next = z1->next;
00209                 z1 = z1_next;
00210             }
00211         }
00212     }
00213     putchar('\n');
00214 
00215 } /* Cudd_zddPrintSubtable */

00235 static int
00236 cuddZddDagInt(
00237   DdNode * n,
00238   st_table * tab)
00239 {
00240     if (n == NIL(DdNode))
00241         return(0);
00242 
00243     if (st_is_member(tab, (char *)n) == 1)
00244         return(0);
00245 
00246     if (Cudd_IsConstant(n))
00247         return(0);
00248 
00249     (void)st_insert(tab, (char *)n, NIL(char));
00250     return(1 + cuddZddDagInt(Cudd_T(n), tab) +
00251         cuddZddDagInt(Cudd_E(n), tab));
00252 
00253 } /* cuddZddDagInt */
